paragragh.text: In the past 10 years has any person to be insured ever been diagnosed, tested positive or been treated by a member of the medical profession, including office visits or had any disorder of:

question.text: a) the lungs or respiratory system including: allergies, asthma, bronchitis, tuberculosis, emphysema, pleurisy or pneumonia?

b) the heart or circulatory system including: high blood pressure,heart attack,heart murmur,chest pain,coronary artery disease,irregular heartbeat or palpitations,elevated cholesterol, varicose veins, phlebitis, stroke or rheumatic fever?
Please specify
Please specify
c) the digestive system including: ulcer, gastritis, intestinal disorder, colitis, crohnâ€™s disease, gall bladder, hemorrhoids, hernia, disorder of the pancreas, spleen or liver (such as hepatitis)?

d)the nervous system including: grand mal or petit mal epilepsy, convulsions, seizures, multiple sclerosis, headaches, paralysis, mental or emotional disorders, psychiatric treatment or professional counselling, depression, fainting or dizziness?
e) the genitourinary system including: kidney disorder, kidney stones, cystitis or bladder infections?
f) the endocrine system and glands such as: breast, thyroid, diabetes, elevated blood sugar or sugar in the urine?
g) eyes or ears including: impaired sight or hearing?
h) cancer, leukemia, tumor, cyst or growth of any kind?
i) the muscular or skeletal system including but not limited to: arthritis, gout, rheumatism, back or spine, knee, foot or jaw, spinal manipulations or adjustments, bursitis or amputation?
j) the male or female reproductive organs including: prostate problems, irregular menstruation, abnormal pap test, or pregnancy complications?
k) sexually transmitted diseases including: syphilis, gonorrhea, herpes, chlamydia, or condyloma acuminatum (anal or genital warts)?
l) any blood disorder including: anemia, thrombocytopenia, polycythemia vera, or hemophilia?
m) lupus erythematosus, collagen disease, or any connective tissue disorder?
n) had a chronic cough, significant weight loss or gain, chronic fatigue, diarrhea, or enlarged glands within the last 12 months?
o) Is any person to be insured pregnant?

paragragh.text: Has any person to be insured:

question.text: a) Used or currently consumes alcohol?

b) Used sedatives, hallucinogenic or narcotic drugs, amphetamines, barbiturates, cocaine, opiates, tranquillizers, morphine or is currently using other stimulants or depressants except as medication prescribed by a physician?
c) Received or been recommended for professional treatment or counseling for an alcohol or narcotic dependency
d)Taking or used any prescription drugs within the last 90 days?
e) Within the last 2 years, had medical treatment or been advised by a member of the medical profession to have any diagnostic test, hospitalization or surgery which was not completed?
f) Had an electrocardiogram, chest x-ray or blood study of any kind in the past 2 years?

g) Within the past 10 years been diagnosed by or received treatment from a member of the medical profession for Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) or AIDS related complex (ARC) or AIDS related conditions or tested positive for HIV?
h) Been under medical observation or receiving treatment by a member of the medical profession, had a check-up or surgery during the past 3 years not reported in the above questions?
